function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 through construction industry complaints.","Impact":"Risk of spreading COVID-19 among construction workers and their contacts.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety protocols, vaccination campaigns, and regular testing of construction workers.","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and remote work solutions for non-essential personnel.","People":"Construction workers, their families, and communities in which construction activities take place.","Owner":"Construction companies, government health authorities, and regulatory agencies."}]}
